data.comment: The match is underway in Tijuana.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Tijuana de Caliente is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Tijuana de Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente push forward at Estadio Caliente and Kevin Balanta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Cruz Azul defence.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
Edgar Lopez is on target to give Tijuana de Caliente a 1-0 advantage.
Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 13, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
In the minute 19, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Cruz Azul throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 22, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Cruz Azul's Ignacio Rivero has been booked in Tijuana.
Tijuana de Caliente to take a throw-in in Cruz Azul territory.
In the minute 23, Tijuana de Caliente's Bryan Angulo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 25, Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Throw-in high up the field for Cruz Azul in Tijuana.
In the minute 27, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Cruz Azul.
In the minute 30, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Cruz Azul.
In the minute 36, Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente territory.
Cruz Azul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tijuana.
Tijuana de Caliente have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
In the minute 43, Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Goal kick for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway in Tijuana.
Cruz Azul have a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Alexis Gutierrez is replacing Alex Castro for the away team.
Tijuana de Caliente needs to be cautious. Cruz Azul have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Cruz Azul drives forward and Jose Martinez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Santiago Gimenez (Cruz Azul) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Cruz Azul close to the penalty box.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a throw-in for Cruz Azul, close to Tijuana de Caliente's area.
In Tijuana, Jose Martinez of Cruz Azul is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 51, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Tijuana to check on Edgar Lopez, who is grimacing with pain.
Attention is being given to Cruz Azulâ€™s Igor Lichnovsky and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 53, Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Tijuana de Caliente a goal kick.
Edgar Lopez has recovered and rejoins the match in Tijuana.
Igor Lichnovsky is back on the pitch.
In the minute 55, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Oscar Mejia Garcia.
Cruz Azul are coming forward and Igor Lichnovsky gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tijuana de Caliente goal kick.
In the minute 56, Can Cruz Azul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tijuana de Caliente's half?
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 61, Santiago Gimenez of Cruz Azul gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tijuana.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a Tijuana de Caliente throw-in in Cruz Azul's half.
Marcel Ruiz is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 66, Marcel Ruiz (Tijuana de Caliente) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Christian Rivera.
Cruz Azul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team replace Bryan Angulo with Luis Leal.
In the minute 71, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tijuana.
Tijuana de Caliente pushes forward through Luis Leal, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 74, Oscar Mejia Garcia signals a free kick to Cruz Azul.
Vladimir Lorona for Tijuana de Caliente has been booked by Oscar Mejia Garcia and receives a first yellow card.
Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Tijuana a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 76, Cruz Azul's Luis Romo is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Jordi Cortizo is on a sub for Mauro Lainez for Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 78, David Barbona is replacing Fabian Castillo for Tijuana de Caliente at Estadio Caliente.
Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but David Barbona's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Cruz Azul at Estadio Caliente.
In the minute 82, Tijuana de Caliente have a goal kick.
Goal! Cruz Azul have got their heads in front thanks to a Jonathan Rodriguez strike.
Cruz Azul make their second substitution with Misael Dominguez replacing Santiago Gimenez.
In the minute 85, Tijuana de Caliente awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Tijuana de Caliente.
Corner awarded to Tijuana de Caliente.
In the minute 86, Tijuana de Caliente are pushing forward but Jordi Cortizo's finish is wide of the goal.
Oscar Mejia Garcia awards Cruz Azul a goal kick.
Rafael Baca is on a sub for Orbelin Pineda for Cruz Azul.
In the minute 88, Ball goes out of play for a Cruz Azul goal kick.
Robert Siboldi is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Caliente with Josue Reyes replacing Jonathan Rodriguez.
Throw-in for Tijuana de Caliente in the half of Cruz Azul.
Free kick for Tijuana de Caliente in their own half.
Throw-in for Cruz Azul in their own half.
Can Tijuana de Caliente get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cruz Azul's half?
Free kick for Cruz Azul in the half of Tijuana de Caliente.
That's full-time at Estadio Caliente. The final score is 1-2.
